page.title: 18Merched y Wawr,Dinas
page.content:
{************************************** {************************************** {Mudiad Cymraeg i ferched ydyw Merched {y Wawr. Sefydlwyd y Mudiad yn {genedlaethol yn y Bala ym l972. { Merched y wawr is a club for women which helps the public.They have 25 to 30 members.They do a variety of things such as{hold markets,hold coffee {evenings}and{do home help. They meet monthly either in the school hall or in the vestry in Tabor chapel to listen to speakers or to discuss future activities.{ { Merched y Wawr}is a Welsh-speaking organisation set up nationally in l972. All activities are conducted through the medium of Welsh.
{************************************** {**************************************
